en: en,English
Capoo Classroom start~
Right click to open the Capoo book.
zh_tw: 按下滑鼠右鍵可以打開圖鑑。

en: Left click to open the Capoo book.
zh_tw: 按下滑鼠左鍵可以打開圖鑑。

en: Left double-click the bugcat to call it to the desktop.
zh_tw: 對著貓蟲雙擊滑鼠左鍵，把貓蟲呼叫到桌面上來。

en: Left click the bugcat to call it to the desktop.
zh_tw: 對著貓蟲點擊滑鼠左鍵，把貓蟲呼叫到桌面上來。

en: Great! Do it again!
You can get the new bugcat when the hint on the  Capoo book.
zh_tw: 當圖鑑上出現左邊的提示，表示可以獲得新貓蟲。

en: Drag a bugcat to collide with another one to get a new bugcat.
zh_tw: 拖曳貓蟲去碰撞另一隻貓蟲，就可以獲得新貓蟲。

en: Left click the yellow button to get the new bugcat.
zh_tw: 用滑鼠左鍵點擊下方的黃色按鍵來取得新貓蟲。

en: Left click the recycling icon, all the bugcats on the desktop can be recycled in to the Capoo book.
zh_tw: 用滑鼠左鍵點擊回收桶按鍵，可以把桌面上的所有貓蟲回收到圖鑑裡。

en: Left click the question mark button to display the operation instructions.
zh_tw: 用滑鼠左鍵點擊問號按鍵，顯示操作說明。

en: You can read operation instructions here.
zh_tw: 可閱讀操作提示與說明。

en:
Start to play with 
 the bugcats!
Clicking the right mouse button on Bugcat will display its name.
zh_tw: 在貓蟲上點擊滑鼠右鍵，會顯示貓蟲的名稱。

en: The mouse hovers over the Bugcats in the book will  display its name
zh_tw: 在貓蟲上停留，會顯示貓蟲的名稱。

en: Check the dual-screen settings and the always-on-top display setting for Bugcats and the Book.
zh_tw: 勾選進行貓蟲雙螢幕設定、取消置頂設定。

en: Check the switch-screen and the always-on-top display settings.
zh_tw: 勾選進行切換螢幕設定、貓蟲置頂設定。

en: Click to view achievements.

Change the setting would make 
 the Capoo Pals to be restarted.
zh_tw: 變更螢幕設定將會重啟圖鑑。

en: Close the Capoo Pals?
zh_tw: 是否確定關閉螢幕貓蟲咖波？

en: Internet is disconnected. Please check the internet and restart the program.
zh_tw:
網路連線中斷，
請確認網路環境後，
重新啟動程式。

en: Re-sent the short message.
Congratulations!
Your ACHV url
Your ACHV page
Your account is repeatedly logged in
A new version is online now, go to download !
zh_tw: 檢測到新版本, 請立即前往更新！

en:
【Happy New Year Upgrade】
maintenance time：
2023/1/2 9:30-11:30(UTC+8)
【Capoo Pals Bulletin】
Dual Screen
Switch Screen
Topmost
Bugcats
Book
We have detected that your file is corrupted. Would you like to reset it? This will not affect your achievement records.
zh_tw: 偵測到您檔案毀損，請問是否重置，不影響已獲取的成就紀錄。

en: The game data reset is complete.
Virtual desktop crossing
App Topmost setting
